moves.7. Be3 b6 8. Bxc5 bxc5 9. Bd5 Bb7 10. Bx: I thought this wasn't the best move for white.
moves.17... Rfe8 18. Nb5 Qd7 19. Nxc7: White tries to remove the queens support from that pesky knight.
moves.20. Nxe8 Nxf1 21. Nf6+ gxf6: Black has to sacrifice the increased defence.
moves.22. Rxf1 Re8: Black beefs up the defence a bit
moves.25... Bc8 26. Nxh6+ Kg7 27. Qxf7+ Kh8: White now threatens either Rxf6 or (possibly more deadly) Qg6.
